evidence_summary: Merck KGaA, Darmstadt, Germany, operates globally in Life Science, Healthcare, and Electronics sectors, providing products and services to accelerate scientific breakthroughs, develop life-changing therapies, and advance digital living.
rationale: The evidence summary states that Merck KGaA (EMD Group) operates in Life Science and Healthcare, providing products and services to accelerate scientific breakthroughs and develop life-changing therapies. These activities are core to the Pharma/Biotech/Healthcare category, even though the company also has an Electronics sector. The primary emphasis in the summary is on healthcare and life sciences, which justifies this classification with strong confidence.
